lib.aide
 

  • Uses of JsonContentAction.InjectJson in lib.aide

    Classes in lib.aide that implement JsonContentAction.InjectJson
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    JsonContentAction.AppendObject
    AppendObject assumes that injectInJsonPath is an array and appends the evaluated SpEL expressions to that array.
    static final record 
    JsonContentAction.ApplyKeyValuePairs
    ApplyKeyValuePairs assumes that injectInJsonPath is a map and applies the evaluated SpEL expressions as key-value pairs.
